extDesr.message: Manage extensions, Quickly enable/disable, Support batching operation, Smart sorting. Fast, Simple and Secure.

speedManageDesc.message: Click once to disable all (except for themes & locked extensions)

speedManageLock.message: Click the Extension Icon to Lock/Unlock it:

otherDesc.message: You can visit Extension Manager in Chrome Web Store to post a comment to give me a thumb-up or any suggestions

otherDonate.message: Also, if you like, you can invite me to have a cup of coffee and motivate me to continually optimize it :-)

showBadgeDesc.message: Show the total number of the enabled extensions (except for locked extensions) in the toolbar ico, i.e. extension badge

showExtNameDesc.message: Show its name when hovering over extension icon

rightMoreDesc.message: To get more functions by right-clicking the extension icon

emptyShowListCon.message: No enabled extensions in this group!

optionGroupDesc.message: Using grouping, you can flexibly switch to different scenes such as home or company, to make management more convenient

optionGroupOperat.message: Under the selected group, click the extension ico to colorize to lock it into the group

optionGroupDelete.message: Are you sure to delete this group?
